attributes.action: undertake not to use information obtained by vehicle recognition and other proposed vehicle tracking systems for monitoring the movements of citizens of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vehicle numberplate recognition devices have a legitimate role in identifying vehicles without road fund licences but should not be used for the routine monitoring of vehicle movements of private citizens as is currently the case.  It is almost certain that any proposed road charging system will be used in the same way. As we cannot trust politicians not to steathily introduce other uses, we must vote against the proposed road charging legislation to protect our right to privacy.
